oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph postcard of Alfred Brevard Crenshaw with two unidentified soldiers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This photograph postcard shows Pvt. Alfred Brevard Crenshaw, MG Co, 7th Inf. Regt., with two unidentified soldiers. They are standing on the wooden floor of their squad tent, which is collapsed around the center pole in the background. Crenshaw and the man on left are armed with holstered M1911 pistols and are shaking hands. Hand written on the reverse is Crenshaw's name, his unit and the date he sailed for France.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Crenshaw, Alfred Brevard
